job.title: Senior Software Engineer, Frontend Platform
job.description: Upstart is a leading AI lending platform partnering with banks to expand access to affordable credit As we transitioned to being a public company were now poised to leverage our domain expertise and revolutionize every aspect of lending and credit risk evaluation Weve recently expanded our offerings to include automobile refinancing and we plan to take on more verticals as the business growsbrbrBy leveraging Upstarts AI platform Upstartpowered banks can have higher approval rates and lower loss rates while simultaneously delivering the exceptional digitalfirst lending experience their customers demand Upstarts patentpending platform is the first to receive a noaction letter from the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau related to fair lending Upstart is based in San Mateo California and Columbus OhiobrbrMost Upstarters join us because they connect with our mission of enabling access to effortless credit based on true risk If you are energized by the impact you can make at Upstart wed love to hear from youbrbrstrongThe TeambrbrstrongOur brand new Frontend Platform team builds tools and services that are used internally by the engineering design and product teams In collaboration with the broader Platform org we build tooling to move towards a microservices architecture as well as collaborate with the design team to take our existing Design Language system to the next levelbrbrAs a strongSenior Software Engineer Frontend Platformstrong at Upstart you will strongbe an integral member of a growing organization help improve user experience for our existing products as well as lay the foundation for future frontend development best practices within the engineering organizationbrbrstrongstronguHow Youll Make An Impactbrustrongul liBuild tools and services to increase engineer velocity and qualityli liBuild design systems to enable consistent UI development and a shared vocabulary between engineering and designli liIntegrating tools to improve JavaScript performance and reduce bundle sizeli liBuild relationships with frontend engineers in product orgs and drive best practicesli liHelp us build our engineering team and make Upstart a genuinely awesome place to workli brbrulstronguWhat Were Looking Forbrustrongul liMinimum requirementsliulul li6 years of professional web development experience with at least 2 years of experience working with modern Javascript web frameworks like React Angular Vue Svelte etcli liA solid understanding of semantic HTML and CSS3 including layouts responsive design and accessibilityli liExperience with modern testing frameworks eg Jest Cypress Mocha Chaili ul liPreferred qualificationsliul liWrites high quality code and is willing to work outside frontend technologiesli liIs adept at clear concise wellorganized written communication about their workli liA desire to solve the needs of your colleagues as part of a platform teamli ul brbrstronguWhat Youll Lovebrustrongul liCompetitive Compensation base  bonus amp equityli liComprehensive medical dental and vision coverageli liPersonal Development and Technology amp Ergonomic Budgets li liLife insurance and disability benefits li liClubs and Activities Game Nights Fitstarters Superwomen Book Club Investing Club Money Discussions Photography Club and Basketball teams li liGenerous vacation policyli li401kli liCatered lunches  snacks amp drinksli brulUpstart is a proud Equal Opportunity Employer We are dedicated to ensuring that underrepresented classes receive better access to affordable credit and are just as committed to embracing diversity and inclusion in our hiring practices We celebrate all cultures backgrounds perspectives and experiences and know that we can only become better togetherbrbrhttpswwwupstartcomcandidateprivacypolicy
